panels.description: This detects the rate of change in disk space usage on host m1 over the past 2 hours.
panels.title: M1 Disk Space Usage Change Rate:

panels.description: This query computes the average memory usage for each active service (excluding the total node usage).
panels.title: Average Memory Usage for Active Services

panels.description: This query calculates the per-second rate of incoming network traffic for host m1 over the past hour.
panels.title: M1 Network Traffic Rate Over Time per-second over past hour:

panels.description: Set Threshold below based on you server actual memory side ie 90% percent of 8gb is 7.2gb in MB is 7200mb
panels.title: TG Cluster RAM Usage in MB

panels.description: Set Threshold below based on you server actual memory side ie 90% percent of 8gb is 7.2gb in MB is 7200mb
panels.title: TG Cluster Network Connections

panels.description: This shows the peak queries per second for specified endpoints over the last day.
panels.title: Peak QPS (Queries Per Second) for Specific Endpoints:

panels.description: This query calculates the total number of requests in the RESTPP service where the maximum latency exceeded 1000 ms. It sums up the instances where the latency, as measured by the max_latency statistic, is greater than 1000 milliseconds across all endpoints.
panels.title: Total Number of Requests with High Latency over 1000 milliseconds
